name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Errors
description: This is a repository of errors APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Stack Exchange
apis.description: After someone asks a question, members of the community propose answers. Others vote on those answers. Very quickly, the answers with the most votes rise to the top. You dont have to read through a lot of discussion to find the best answer.    Like to...

apis.name: Instructure
apis.description: Instructure makes software that makes smarter people. Products include Canvas LMS, Bridge and Canvas Network.

apis.name: TelAPI
apis.description: Zang offers business communications tools & voice app development platforms that bring innovation and ease to unified communications & collaboration solutions.

apis.name: Bugsnag
apis.description: Bugsnag monitors apps for errors that impact customers & reports all diagnostic data. By default, we save every error, so your data wont be sampled. Try it free.

apis.name: Runscope
apis.description: API performance monitoring. Everything is going to be 200 OK

apis.name: Shopify
apis.description: Shopify is a commerce platform that allows anyone to easily sell online at a retail location and everywhere in between. It offers a professional online storefront, a payment solution to accept credit cards, and the Shopify POS application to power retail sales.

apis.name: Google Stackdriver Monitoring
apis.description: Google Stackdriver provides powerful monitoring, logging, and diagnostics. It equips you with insight into the health, performance, and availability of cloud-powered applications, enabling you to find and fix issues faster. It is natively integrated with Google Cloud Platform, Amazon Web Services, and popular open source packages. Stackdriver provides a wide variety of metrics, dashboards, alerting, log management, reporting, and tracing capabilities.

apis.name: AWS OpsWorks
apis.description: AWS OpsWorks is a configuration management service that uses Chef, an automation platform that treats server configurations as code. OpsWorks uses Chef to automate how servers are configured, deployed, and managed across your Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) instances or on-premises compute environments. OpsWorks has two offerings, AWS Opsworks for Chef Automate, and AWS OpsWorks Stacks.

apis.name: Google Search Console
apis.description: Search Console is a free service that enables you to monitor your sites performance in Google Search, to ensure that Google can crawl your site or app correctly, and to test the validity and performance of a given page. Search Console provides programmatic access to the service through the APIs documented here.

apis.name: Avaza
apis.description: Avaza is a beautiful online software suite with modules for Project Management, Timesheets, Expenses & Invoicing. Access from anywhere, with any device. Avaza is the leading all-in-one software for running client focused businesses. Avaza allows businesses of all sizes to more easily and effectively manage team projects, time tracking, expense reporting, quoting & invoicing. It can be accessed simply via a web browser from anywhere in the world on any device.

apis.name: PayRun
apis.description: An open, scalable, transparent and HMRC accredited payroll API. Put the power of payroll into your application today.

apis.name: LogMeIn
apis.description: LogMeIn, Inc. is a provider of software as a service and cloud-based remote connectivity services for collaboration, IT management and customer engagement, founded in 2003 and based in Boston, Massachusetts.

apis.name: GIG & CROWD
apis.description: A unique system of the order and booking of artists: negotiations, coordination of conditions, convenient reminders of fee payment terms and rider preparation.

apis.name: Dezrez
apis.description: Cloud based estate agent software , sales & letting agent software, estate agent website design and property management software - Dezrez  Services

apis.name: Broadleaf Commerce
apis.description: Broadleaf Commerce is a software technology company headquartered in Dallas, Texas, providing an open source Java eCommerce platform based on Spring Framework.
